alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Fergus; Hill; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 8:40PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from showers will impact portions of northern Judith Basin, northwestern Fergus, southwestern Blaine, southeastern Hill, Chouteau and northeastern Cascade Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 838 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds associated with shower activity over Cascade, Chouteau, Judith Basin, and Fergus County. This activity is moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Observed. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Benton, Stanford, Belt, Geraldine, Denton, Winifred, Parker School, Highwood, Geyser, Agency, St. Pierre, Carter, Floweree, Shonkin, Danvers, Loma, Iliad, Virgelle, Raynesford and Portage. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 0 and 38. Highway 87 between mile markers 9 and 60, and between mile markers 69 and 74. Highway 89 between mile markers 70 and 71, and between mile markers 72 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
